=================

.. py:module:: zpyhelper.filesys

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: checkdir(dirs: Union[list, str])

   
   check if directories exist, if not, generate directories

   :Parameters: **dirs** (*list or str*) -- a list of directory strings or a directory string

   :raises Exception: input must be list or string















   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!

.. py:function:: is_jsonable(x) -> bool

   
   check if an object is JSON serializable

   :Parameters: **x** (*any*) -- the object to check

   :returns: *bool* -- `True`: serializable















   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!
